The class {{tt|leap_second}} represents the date and time of a leap second insertion.

Users cannot construct {{tt|leap_second}} objects except by copying from existing {{tt|leap_second}} objects. The library implementation creates {{tt|leap_second}} objects when it initializes the time zone database and provides {{c/core|const}} access to these objects.

{{tt|leap_second}} has a defaulted copy constructor and a defaulted copy assignment operator.
